data.message: Hi...it's me Louise and if there is any chance of getting to meet you I would love to......this is mostly for my ex boyfriend to meet you cuz he is in rehab right now and he listens and sings to your music all the time and I really want him to be all he can be and if he got out of rehab and could see you sing life would be amazing. I know you get millions and billions of requests but I hope mine get to your heart. Thanks Me.
